body.value: SD: I was very touched by what you said about Patrick Anderson because I seem to recall one of the other members of Preview saying that “Patrick Anderson was the first man that I had ever met who was a poet” I said, “what do you mean, a poet?” And he said, “the first man who really meant to spend his whole life being a poet.” He said, “I’ve always understood in Canada that you did something else, and you wrote poetry on the side. Patrick Anderson was an inspiration because he was a poet—only a poet.”
